settings.debug.title: Debug (Client Setting)
settings.defaultmacro.title: Override default macro execution
settings.defaultmacro.hint: Enabling this will allow item macro to check if an item has a macro and roll that instead of the default system's execution.
settings.sheethook.title: Character Sheet Hook
settings.sheethook.hint: Enabling this will allow item macro to roll macros from the character sheet.
settings.charsheet.title: Character Sheet Hook
settings.charsheet.hint: Enabling this will allow item macro to roll macros from the character sheet.
settings.visibilty.title: Player access
settings.visibilty.hint: Enabling this will allow player's to view and edit macros on items they own.
settings.icon.title: Display Icon Only
settings.icon.hint: Enabling this will trim the item sheet button to only an Icon.
settings.click.title: Right Click Override (Client Setting)
settings.click.hint: Enabling this will cause item-macro (on sheethooks only) to execute on right click.
context.label: Update World Item Macros
context.confirm.title: Item Macro Overwrite Prompt
context.confirm.content: Are you sure you want to overwrite all items macro's with
context.prompt.title: Item Macro Overwrite Info
error.editImage: You cannot edit the icon for this macro.
error.macroExecution: There was an error in your macro syntax. See the console (F12) for details
